experiences.description: Developed and maintained data pipelines for drug discovery and clinical trial data. Implemented data quality checks and improved data governance. Worked with a team of scientists and analysts to provide data-driven insights.

Designed and built scalable data infrastructure using AWS services such as S3, EC2, and EMR. Led the development of a new data warehouse to support business intelligence and analytics. Mentored junior data engineers and collaborated with cross-functional teams.

Managed a team of data engineers responsible for building and maintaining data pipelines for various clients. Implemented best practices for data engineering and ensured data quality and security. Worked with clients to understand their data needs and provide customized solutions. Improved data processing time by 40% by refactoring ETL processes.

education.description: Focused on signal processing and data analysis. Completed a senior thesis on developing a machine learning algorithm for predicting stock prices.
Specialized in data mining and machine learning. Conducted research on developing scalable algorithms for big data analysis. Published a paper on anomaly detection in time series data.
